About the Company: Orient Cement Limited is an India-based frontline cement company engaged in the production and branding of ordinary portland cement (OPC) and portland pozzolana cement (PPC).The Company is primarily engaged in the manufacture and sale of Cement and manufacturing facilities. The Company`s integrated manufacturing unit is located in the limestone belt of Devapur (Adilabad district), Andhra Pradesh, while another split grinding unit is located in Jalgaon, Maharashtra. The Company installed approximately six million tons per annum cement capacity, which is complemented by a 50 megawatts captive power plant.
